    • Method Detail

      • requestResetByEmail

        @GetMapping(value="/request/{email:.+}")
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.passwordreset.PasswordResetApiResponse requestResetByEmail(@PathVariable(name="email")
                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String email)
        GET /api/passwordReset/request/{email}

        Requests a password reset by email. An error will be thrown if:
        • The email format is invalid
        • The email does not correspond to any user
        • The user has already requested a reset within the past 24 hours.

        Otherwise, the user's request will be granted, and they will receive an email with the reset code.

        RESULT: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": null
 }

      • getByCode

        @GetMapping(value="/{code}")
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.passwordreset.PasswordResetApiResponse getByCode(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String code)
        GET /api/passwordReset/{code}

        Gets the password reset information corresponding to the request code. This endpoint is not particularly useful, and is provided for debugging purposes.

        RESULT: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": {
     "id": UUID
     "user": User (sanitized)
     "code": String
   }
 }

      • resetPassword

        @PostMapping(value="/")
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.DefaultApiResponse resetPassword(@RequestBody
                                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> body)
        POST /api/passwordReset/

        Finalizes and resets the user's password to the desired password in "newPassword". The new password must meet the same criteria as for registering a new user.

        REQUEST BODY:
         {
   "code": String (password reset code provided in email),
   "newPassword": String (the desired new password)
 }

        RESULT: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": null
 }
